mapper.select: select rn, no ,title, content, hit, regDate, userNo, name from (select rownum rn, no, title, content, hit, regDate, userNo, name from (select board.no no, title, content, hit, to_char(reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') regDate, user_no userNo, name from board, users where users.no = board.user_no order by board.no asc) order by rn desc) where rn > #{startNo} and rn <= #{endNo}
mapper.insert: insert into board values(seq_board_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, 0, TO_DATE(#{regDate},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), ${userNo})
mapper.select: select rn, no ,title, content, hit, regDate, userNo, name from (select rownum rn, no, title, content, hit, regDate, userNo, name from (select board.no no, title, content, hit, to_char(reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') regDate, user_no userNo, name from board, users where users.no = board.user_no order by board.no asc)) where title like #{voca} or name like #{voca} order by rn desc
